
=head1 NAME

dataset

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 name (character varying(45)) - 
 type (character varying(256)) - 
 version (character varying(45)) - 
 description (character varying(2048)) - 
 native_id (character varying(45)) - 
 publication_dt (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 access_dt (timestamp(3) without time zone) - 
 url (character varying(128)) - 
 data_qualifier (character varying(45)) - 
 scale (character varying(45)) - 
 spatial_ref_sys (character varying(45)) - 
 cite_metadata (character varying(45)) - 
 scope (character varying(45)) - 
 spatial_extent (character varying(512)) - 
 temporal_extent (character varying(512)) - 
 vertical_extent (character varying(45)) - 
 processing_level (character varying(45)) - 
 spatial_res (character varying(45)) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                           Table "gcis_metadata.dataset"
       Column      |              Type              |                      Modifiers                       | Storage  | Stats target | Description 
 ------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+----------+--------------+-------------
  id               | integer                        | not null default nextval('dataset_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    |              | 
  name             | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  type             | character varying(256)         |                                                      | extended |              | 
  version          | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  description      | character varying(2048)        |                                                      | extended |              | 
  native_id        | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  publication_dt   | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                      | plain    |              | 
  access_dt        | timestamp(3) without time zone |                                                      | plain    |              | 
  url              | character varying(128)         |                                                      | extended |              | 
  data_qualifier   | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  scale            | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  spatial_ref_sys  | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  cite_metadata    | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  scope            | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  spatial_extent   | character varying(512)         |                                                      | extended |              | 
  temporal_extent  | character varying(512)         |                                                      | extended |              | 
  vertical_extent  | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  processing_level | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
  spatial_res      | character varying(45)          |                                                      | extended |              | 
 Indexes:
     "dataset_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "dataset_organization" CONSTRAINT "dataset_organization_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (dataset_id) REFERENCES dataset(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
